authController.py module

authController.login()

Authenticate and login a user.

This endpoint allows users to login by providing a username and password.

Returns:

JSON response containing user details or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

authController.logout()

Logout the current user.

This endpoint logs out the user by unsetting JWT cookies.

Returns:

JSON response indicating successful logout.

Return type:

flask.Response

authController.register()

Register a new user.

This endpoint allows users to register by providing a username, password, and role.

Returns:

JSON response containing user details or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response
